name: A New Frontier in Fuzzing: Real-Time Video Detection for CAN Bus Networks
desc: This project pioneers real-time video detection in CAN bus fuzzing, revealing automotive vulnerabilities missed by traditional methods.It is applicable beyond automotive, it paves the way for enhanced cybersecurity in cyber-physical systems.

name: CRACKING THE CODE: HOW I DEFEATED RANSOMWARE TO RESCUE HANK'S FILES
desc: This project is a Python-based decryption tool designed to decrypt files that were encrypted by a ransomware attack.It uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) in CBC mode to decrypt the files and stores the decrypted files in a separate directory.

name: XTU-J9 Smartdoor Bell Pen-Testing
desc: Pen-tested and submitted a report highlighting vulnerabilities such as data exposure and encryption weaknesses.

name: Unlocking Legacy ARM Firmware:Brute Force Unicorn Rehosting and Protocol Reverse Engineering on Raspberry Pi Pico.
desc: This project documents the reverse engineering of UART and SPI protocols on a Raspberry Pi Pico-based hardware security token, as well as rehosting a key firmware function using the Unicorn

name: GDPR Compliance Checker with ZAP and Nmap Integration
desc: This tool automates the evaluation of websites for GDPR violations and security vulnerabilities. It features cookie analysis, third-party script detection,OWASP ZAP and Nmap etc

name: My Website Security Level Assessment
desc: IN PROGRESS!!! : I am planning on hosting the website in another platform like Heroku to check server side vulnerabilities along with client side vulnerabilities.
